data.comment: The big names in today's match at Signal Iduna Park have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 3, Benjamin Brand awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Great shot from Dortmund's Jadon Sancho but he is denied by the crossbar.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 5, 1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, 1. FC Cologne's Ismail Jakobs gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 9, Ellyes Skhiri is on target to give 1. FC Cologne a 0-1 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Marius Wolf.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benjamin Brand awards the home team a throw-in.
Dortmund push upfield but Benjamin Brand quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 15, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Throw-in Dortmund.
In the minute 18, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 21, 1. FC Cologne pushes forward through Jan Thielmann, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
In the minute 26, Dortmund are pushing forward but Erling Haaland's finish is wide of the goal.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 27, Throw-in high up the field for Dortmund in Dortmund.
Free kick for Dortmund in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Ellyes Skhiri (1. FC Cologne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 30, Dortmund advance rapidly upfield but Benjamin Brand blows for offside.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
Benjamin Brand awards the away team a throw-in.
Benjamin Brand signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Dortmund's half.
In the minute 36, Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 39, Dortmund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Dortmund push forward at Signal Iduna Park and Axel Witsel gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined 1. FC Cologne defence.
In the minute 41, Benjamin Brand signals a Dortmund throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Dortmund.
At Signal Iduna Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 48, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Dortmund.
Dortmund's Marco Reus is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Can 1. FC Cologne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dortmund's half?
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne close to the penalty box.
Benjamin Brand awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Dortmund's Emre Can misses with an attempt on goal.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
In the minute 52, 1. FC Cologne needs to be cautious. Dortmund have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at Signal Iduna Park.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Emre Can is booked for the home team.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
In the minute 56, Benjamin Brand signals a throw-in for Dortmund, close to 1. FC Cologne's area.
Axel Witsel of Dortmund gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
In the minute 58, Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Thomas Meunier for Dortmund who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 60, It's now 0-2 in Dortmund as Ellyes Skhiri scores for 1. FC Cologne.
Lucien Favre (Dortmund) is making a first substitution, with Thorgan Hazard replacing Thomas Meunier.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 63, 1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Dortmund.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rafael Czichos is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Benjamin Brand signals a Dortmund throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Rafael Czichos with Jannes Horn. This is the first substitution made today by Markus Gisdol.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 67, Lucien Favre is making the team's second substitution at Signal Iduna Park with Youssoufa Moukoko replacing Julian Brandt.
Giovanni Reyna is replacing Felix Passlack for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
In the minute 70, Dortmund are coming forward and Youssoufa Moukoko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
Benjamin Brand signals a Dortmund throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 73, Markus Gisdol is making the team's second substitution at Signal Iduna Park with Dominick Drexler replacing Elvis Rexhbecaj.
Goal! Thorgan Hazard pulls one back to make it 1-2.
Giovanni Reyna with an assist there.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Dortmund.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 77, Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Dortmund in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Benjamin Brand awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 83, Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
In Dortmund, Erling Haaland of Dortmund is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 86, 1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Mats Hummels of Dortmund smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Dortmund have a dangerous throw-in.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
1. FC Cologne drives forward and Ismail Jakobs gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
Erling Haaland of Dortmund gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at Signal Iduna Park.
Benjamin Brand blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
Ismail Jakobs for 1. FC Cologne has been booked by Benjamin Brand and receives a first yellow card.
Markus Gisdol (1. FC Cologne) is making a third substitution, with Kingsley Ehizibue replacing Jan Thielmann.
